named-query.name: WeblogEntryComment.getCountAllDistinctByStatus
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c) FROM WeblogEntryComment c where c.status = ?1

named-query.name: WeblogEntryComment.getCountDistinctByWebsite&Status
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c) FROM WeblogEntryComment c WHERE c.weblogEntry.website = ?1 AND c.status = ?2

named-query.name: WeblogEntryComment.getMostCommentedWebsiteByEndDate
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c), c.weblogEntry.website.id, c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.website.name FROM WeblogEntryComment c WHERE c.weblogEntry.pubTime < ?1 GROUP BY c.weblogEntry.website.id, c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.website.name

named-query.name: WeblogEntryComment.getMostCommentedWebsiteByEndDate&StartDate
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c), c.weblogEntry.website.id, c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.website.name FROM WeblogEntryComment c WHERE c.weblogEntry.pubTime < ?1 AND c.weblogEntry.pubTime > ?2 GROUP BY c.weblogEntry.website.id, c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.website.name

named-query.name: WeblogEntryComment.getMostCommentedWeblogEntryByEndDate
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c), c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.anchor, c.weblogEntry.title FROM WeblogEntryComment c WHERE c.weblogEntry.pubTime < ?1 GROUP BY c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.anchor, c.weblogEntry.title

named-query.name: WeblogEntryComment.getMostCommentedWeblogEntryByEndDate&StartDate
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c), c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.anchor, c.weblogEntry.title FROM WeblogEntryComment c WHERE c.weblogEntry.pubTime < ?1 AND c.weblogEntry.pubTime > ?2 GROUP BY c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.anchor, c.weblogEntry.title

named-query.name: WeblogEntryComment.getMostCommentedWeblogEntryByWebsite&EndDate
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c), c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.anchor, c.weblogEntry.title FROM WeblogEntryComment c WHERE c.weblogEntry.website = ?1 AND c.weblogEntry.pubTime < ?2 GROUP BY c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.anchor, c.weblogEntry.title

named-query.name: WeblogEntryComment.getMostCommentedWeblogEntryByWebsite&EndDate&StartDate
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c), c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.anchor, c.weblogEntry.title FROM WeblogEntryComment c WHERE c.weblogEntry.website = ?1 AND c.weblogEntry.pubTime < ?2 AND c.weblogEntry.pubTime > ?3 GROUP BY c.weblogEntry.website.handle, c.weblogEntry.anchor, c.weblogEntry.title
